text: Philip Hamilton was the first kid of Alexander and Eliza Hamilton. He was born January 22, 1782 and died on November 24, 1801 due to challenging George Eacker to a duel after the man had started spreading verbal criticism towards his father. Eacker shot first. Like his father, he was a graduate of Kings college, and had a promising future lined up for him before his early demise. He was a poet Category:1782 births Category:1801 deaths Category:American people
title: Philip Hamilton
